title: Sailors Get Tinder Swindled While Hoping For Some Strange
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 4 rounds in the magazine ... ROUND 1: The Tinder Swindler: Navy Edition ROUND 2: We’ve got a raccoon in upstate New York who apparently hates America ROUND 3: Two brothers who haven’t spoken to each other for about 30 years are now competing for the coveted position of mayor in an Ontario town ROUND 4: There's An Intriguing Link Between US Presidents And The Wars They Wage.. and it involves thinkin your shit don't stink SUPPORT THE SHOW!
